hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“Hamzah Al-Aslami asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): ‘I am fasting, should I fast while traveling?’ The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘If you wish, then fast, and if you wish, then break your fast.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّوْمِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning fasting while traveling
